# genesyscloud_telephony_providers_edges_site (Data Source)

Data source for Genesys Cloud Sites. Select a site by name

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "genesyscloud_telephony_providers_edges_site" "site" {
  name = "test site name"
}
```

## Schema

- `name` (String) Site name.
